posts.post_content: I recently acquired a binder containing 66 baseball related postcards.  They include 23 stadium PCs, 1 "Red Belt", 2 amateur RPPCs, 2 Albertypes- Gehrig and Hubbell. The remainder is composed mostly of 1906-1915 comic baseball PCs, with some very nice ones.  If anyone has any interest, please email me at [url]garypass57@yahoo.com[/url] for more information.  Thanks.
Still available. Here a few pics.  Looking for reasonable offer.
